title: Consider the purpose of the worksheet
text: Think about what the worksheet is intended to convey or track. A good title should reflect this purpose clearly.

title: Avoid personal names
text: A good worksheet title should be professional and not include personal names unless absolutely necessary.

title: Include relevant details
text: Consider including specific details like dates or departments if they are relevant to the worksheet's content.

title: Evaluate the given options
text: Which of the following titles best reflects the qualities of a good worksheet title?
